1.title: Lightning Fast
1.description: Process hundreds of images in seconds directly in your browser.

2.title: Complete Privacy
2.description: Your images are never uploaded to servers; processing happens locally.

3.title: Full Customization
3.description: Control size, position, opacity, and even rotation for perfect results.

howItWorks.title: How Stampr Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to protect your images and brand

1.title: Upload Logo
1.description: Choose your branding logo in PNG or JPG format.

2.title: Upload Images
2.description: Select the batch of images you want to stamp.

3.title: Adjust Settings
3.description: Use live preview to fine-tune opacity and positioning.

4.title: Download All
4.description: Click process and download your images in a single ZIP.

1.a: Yes, Stampr uses client-side processing, meaning images never leave your device.

2.a: We support PNG, JPG, and WebP for both logos and images.

3.a: Our goal is to provide a simple, effective tool for creators and small businesses.

ImageLogoTool.title: Logo Stamping Tool
ImageLogoTool.previewHint: Upload logo and images to see preview here
ImageLogoTool.previewDisclaimer: This is a quick preview, final quality may vary
ImageLogoTool.uploadHint: Upload logo and images to start processing

1.title: Data Collection
1.text: We do not collect any images you upload. All images are processed locally in your browser and are never sent to our servers.

2.title: Cookies & Analytics
2.text: We use cookies and localStorage to save your preferences and improve our service. We also use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site. This helps us improve the user experience. You can control cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner.

3.title: Google AdSense
3.text: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google, as a third-party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads based on your previous visits to our website and other sites. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google's Ads Settings.

4.title: Social Media Sharing
4.text: Our blog posts include social sharing buttons (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, WhatsApp). When you use these buttons, the respective social media platforms may collect information according to their own privacy policies.

5.title: Log Files & Server Data
5.text: Like many websites, we collect standard log file information including IP addresses, browser type, and access times. This data is used solely for analytics and improving our service.

1.title: Acceptable Use
1.text: You can use this tool for personal and commercial purposes for free.

2.title: Disclaimer
2.text: This tool is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We are not responsible for any data loss resulting from the use of the tool.

3.title: Prohibited Uses
3.text: You agree not to use the tool to process illegal or copyrighted material that you do not have permission to use. We are not responsible for the content of the images processed through our tool.

AboutPage.title: Empowering Creators to Protect Their Work
AboutPage.subtitle: Stampr is the fastest, most private way to watermark your images.

story.title: Our Story
story.text: Stampr was born from a simple frustration: why does adding a logo to a batch of images have to be so slow, expensive, or privacy-invasive? We realized that most tools either require you to upload your sensitive photos to a remote server or charge you for basic batch processing. We believed there had to be a better way.
story.text2: So we built Stampr. A tool that leverages the power of your modern browser to process images instantly, right on your device. No uploads, no waiting, no privacy risks.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: Your photos never leave your device. All processing happens locally.

speed.title: Lightning Speed
speed.desc: Powered by WebAssembly and modern browser tech for instant results.

simplicity.title: Radical Simplicity
simplicity.desc: No accounts, no complex software. Just drag, drop, and stamp.

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch
ContactPage.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

Footer.aboutText: The easiest way to protect your brand identity. Watermark hundreds of images in seconds directly from your browser.
